mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM C_RETURNS cr JOIN C_MEMBERS cm ON cr.USER_ID=cm.id AND cr.RETURNED_AT IS NULL AND cr.RENT_AT is NOT NULL AND cm.id=#{id}

SELECT c.ID, c.LATITUDE, c.LONGITUDE, c.CLONGITUDE, c.CLATITUDE, c.CAR_NUMBER, r.CAR_NUMBER AS car_number_join, r.CAR_ID, r.OWNER_ID, r.CAR_IMAGE, r.CAR_MODEL, r.MANUFACTURER, r.ENGINE_TYPE, r.CAR_TYPE, r.C_YEAR, s.ID AS rid, s.RETURN_REGION_ID, s.CAR_NUMBER AS car_number_product, s.RENT_PRICE, s.RENT_TIME, s.REGISTERED_AT FROM CMarker c JOIN C_cars r ON c.car_number = r.CAR_ID JOIN C_registrations s ON r.CAR_ID = s.car_number
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMARKER (ID, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE,CAR_NUMBER) VALUES(marker_seq.nextval, #{latitude}, #{longitude},#{car_number})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id rid FROM c_cars c JOIN C_REGISTRATIONS r ON c.CAR_ID = r.CAR_NUMBER WHERE c.CAR_ID=#{car_id}

SELECT mno, CAR_IMAGE,car_model,cno, LATITUDE,LONGITUDE, cr.RENT_PRICE,cr.RENT_TIME,cr.ID FROM C_REGISTRATIONS cr JOIN (select mno, CAR_IMAGE,car_model,cno, cma.LATITUDE,cma.LONGITUDE FROM CMARKER cma JOIN (SELECT cm.ID mno , cc.CAR_IMAGE,cc.CAR_MODEL,cc.CAR_ID cno FROM C_MEMBERS cm JOIN C_CARS cc ON cm.ID=cc.OWNER_ID ) cmc ON cma.CAR_NUMBER = cmc.cno) tr ON cr.CAR_NUMBER= tr.cno AND mno=#{mno}
